alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 12:13AM MDT until June 24 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Todd County in south central South Dakota... Tripp County in south central South Dakota... Southeastern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 112 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Hamill to 7 miles west of Keyapaha, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Keyapaha around 120 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central South Dakota.
